explains: vt. 骚扰；寄生于；大批出没；大批滋生

sentences.en: Lice infest their fur. They snore.
sentences.cn: 它们的毛皮里藏满虱子；睡觉时打鼾。

sentences.en: Several animals in sea water can infest wood.
sentences.cn: 海水中有好多动物能侵害木材。

sentences.en: "Easyjetsetters" infest clubs and bars at weekends.
sentences.cn: 周末很多的悠闲雅皮们留连无数的俱乐部和酒吧。
